Author: dfranke
Content:
"But when those angry people started cursing you, you start to doubt whether what you do is right."

Has it occured to you that that might be because it's wrong?

Author: budu3
Content: I'm sure there's a bit of Bayesian theory involved. I also hear they'll be extracting data from the email to spot trends and stuff. Reading Gabor's blog might give you and idea of what they're all about. http://www.gaborcselle.com/blog/2006/07/how-researchers-are-reinventing-mail.html
